description: Ready made bases leave more time to create a tasty meaty topping for pizza night.
keywords: Meat pizza,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Mince,Egg free,Sesame free,Beef,Peanut free
name: Spicy Beef & Capsicum Pizza Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium red onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Place the pizza bases on two baking trays and set aside.

Heat the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and cook the onions and beef mince for 5 minutes. Add the capsicums, seasoning and chilli flakes and cook for 3 minutes. Stir in the passata, reduce the heat and cook for 10 minutes.
Divide the mince mixture between the two bases and spread out with a spoon. Sprinkle over grated mozzarella and bake for 10 minutes or until golden and bubbling.
